4.cakybaky: In **cakybaky**, the player (avatar) must collect six ingredients (flour, milk, egg, sugar, butter, cherries) in sequential order, using each to unlock the next. The chef chases the player; capture results in loss. Resources are limited and must be collected before they vanish. The player wins by delivering all six ingredients to the table, but loses if caught by the chef or time runs out (1500 steps). Movement is constrained by walls and tables, with collisions causing retreat. Resource collection requires holding the previous item.
